Installation
============


Install with ``pip``
--------------------

.. code:: 

    $ pip install dataflake.wsgi.werkzeug


Install with ``zc.buildout``
----------------------------
Just add :mod:`dataflake.wsgi.werkzeug` to the ``eggs`` setting(s) in your
buildout configuration to have it pulled in automatically::

    ...
    eggs =
        dataflake.wsgi.werkzeug
    ...
